purpose: The email is a call for participation in the 29th Ada-Europe International Conference on Reliable Software Technologies (AEiC 2025) scheduled for June 10-13, 2025, in Paris, France.
evidence_sentences: 29th Ada-Europe International Conference on Reliable Software Technologies (AEiC 2025)
Register now: discounted fees until May 27!

Extensive information on AEiC 2025 will be on the conference website, such as an overview of the program, the list of accepted papers and presentations, and descriptions of workshops, tutorials, keynote and invited presentations, and social events.
